welcome_message_body: Welcome to Torbali, Turkey! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes, historical sites, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Torbali has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Se•Ko Kokoreç House
restaurants.description: Se•Ko Kokoreç House is a kokoreç restaurant located in Torbalı.
restaurants.address: ertuğrul mahallesi 3007 sokak no 27/A (ertuğrul  caddesi), 35860 Torbalı

restaurants.name: Paşa Cafe & Pastahane
restaurants.description: Paşa Cafe & Pastahane is a café located in İzmir.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights within Turkey.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights to and from Turkey.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cigli AB Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cigli AB Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
